about_the_game:
"Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning" is the last part of the thrilling "Greed" triology! Dr. Goodwin's miracle cure is once again under threat and Sara has contacted you for help. Old enemies are up to new tricks at Pontoon Laboratories and this time they are willing to kill to get their hands on the cure. Help Sara look into rumors that strange energies are said to be haunting Pontoon Laboratories. This journey will be treacherous as you delve into the haunted lab to confront both the paranormal and living people looking to kill you on sight!

  • hidden object adventure with a haunted sci-fi atmosphere

  • many unique and intriguing puzzles and mini games

  • atmospheric soundtrack and great graphics

  • the follow up to "Greed: The Mad Scientist" and "Greed: Forbidden Experiments"

name: Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5GHz CPU or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound device
